head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CHIRICO, ELIZABETH M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CHIRICO, ELIZABETH M.

block.p: CHIRICO--Elizabeth M., on June 4th, 2007. Loving sister of Neil and Gloria Willig. Also survived by many loving nieces and nephews. Visiting Wednesday, 7-9pm. Thursday 2-5pm and 7-9pm at McLaughlin & Sons Funeral Home, Third Avenue at 97th Street. Mass of Christian Burial, Friday 9:30am, Saint Patrick's Church.
